name: Exam Game (Y_R))
description:
Artillery Game

Controls

Mouse control, press the left mouse button to shoot. Change the level (level 1 to level 5) by pressing the number on the keyboard and pressing Q to return to the main menu.

Features

  • Music
  • Player
  • Enemy
  • Level Switch
  • Bullet Amount
  • Effectors

Sources

  • Platform: https://brackeysgames.itch.io/date-night
  • Tank & BG: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/tanks &  https://www.kenney.nl/assets/background-elements-redux 
  • Font: Google Font
  • Music: https://www.aigei.com/sound/
